Product API

This document describes the endpoints available for managing Categories.

GetProduct

  • Endpoint: http://0.0.0.0:9999/1/api/product/products/

  • Description: Retrieves a list of all Product.

  • Response Body:

    {
"status": "success",
"data": [
    {
        "id": 1,
        "product_name": "Example Product",
        "product_description": "This is a description of the example product.",
        "price": "19.99",
        "stock_quantity": 100,
        "org_id": 1,
        "created_at": "2024-11-12T06:34:16.731791Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-11-12T06:34:16.731791Z",
        "is_active": true,
        "category": 2,
        "subcategory": null
    },
    {
        "id": 5,
        "product_name": "potato",
        "product_description": "fresh potato.",
        "price": "39.00",
        "stock_quantity": 100,
        "org_id": 1,
        "created_at": "2024-11-12T08:47:54.533655Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-11-12T08:47:54.533655Z",
        "is_active": true,
        "category": 2,
        "subcategory": 4
    },

GetProductbyId

  • Endpoint: http://0.0.0.0:9999/1/api/product/products/5/

  • Description: Fetches details of a specific Product using their ID.

  • Response Body:

    {
"status": "success",
"data": {
    "id": 5,
    "product_name": "potato",
    "product_description": "fresh potato.",
    "price": "39.00",
    "stock_quantity": 100,
    "org_id": 1,
    "created_at": "2024-11-12T08:47:54.533655Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-11-12T08:47:54.533655Z",
    "is_active": true,
    "category": 2,
    "subcategory": 4
}

}

CreateProduct

  • Endpoint: http://0.0.0.0:9999/1/api/product/create-products/

  • Request Body:

    {
"product_name": "Sample Product",
"product_description": "This is a sample product description.",
"price": 99.99,
"stock_quantity": 100,
"org_id": 10,
"category": 2,
"subcategory": 5,
"is_active": true
}

  • Description: Adds a new Product to the system.

  • Response Body:

    {
"status": "success",
"data": {
    "id": 9,
    "product_name": "Sample Product",
    "product_description": "This is a sample product description.",
    "price": "99.99",
    "stock_quantity": 100,
    "org_id": 10,
    "created_at": "2024-11-14T07:03:12.926793Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-11-14T07:03:12.926793Z",
    "is_active": true,
    "category": 2,
    "subcategory": 5
}

}

UpdateProduct

  • Endpoint: http://0.0.0.0:9999/1/api/Product/update-Product/{Id}/

  • Request Body:

        {
"id": 5,
"Product_name": "Dairy",
"Product_description": "all types dairy product available",
"org_id": null,
"created_at": "2024-11-12T04:51:03.280121Z",
"updated_at": "2024-11-12T04:51:03.280121Z",
"is_active": true

    }

  • Description: Updates information for a specific Product.

  • Response Body:

    {
    {
"id": 5,
"Product_name": "Dairy",
"Product_description": "all types dairy product available",
"org_id": null,
"created_at": "2024-11-12T04:51:03.280121Z",
"updated_at": "2024-11-12T04:51:03.280121Z",
"is_active": true
    }
}
